title: New: Snoh – Fire's All Around You
body:
Lush vocal from Snoh (Aalegra) on new track Fire’s All Around You, part Ella Eyre, part London Grammar’s Hannah Reid, proving powerful yet intimate.

In truth, perhaps it’s missing the kick of a rousing chorus, that’s not to say it’s not beautifully delicate, just perhaps not quite the radio smash hit that it feels like she’s capable of producing. Check out Fire’s All Around You below, alongside the previously released The Fall.
